About.paragraph: Pepefrens is an NFT project focused on facilitating a community of frens with true and genuine camaraderie. As a project founded by true frens, we feel it is our duty to assist others in finding their community of like-minded individuals. The public will have their opportunity to mint their very own Fren during our Open Fren Mint. Mint cost will be only 0.01 ETH, and 30% of proceeds will be donated to those affected by the war. After our initial mint, stake your Frens for $PEPE, 50% of royalties will be paid to stakers. Merch partnerships and more to come!
